sqlMap.sql:
/* getChildNode */ SELECT A.c_id , A.c_parentid , A.c_position , A.c_left , A.c_right , A.c_level , A.c_title , A.c_type
/* user filed add point*/ , A.C_POINT_USE_FL AS pointUseFl /* 포인트사용여부 */ , A.C_DOWNLOAD_PROH_FL AS downloadProhFl /* 다운로드금지여부 */ , A.C_ARTICLE_READ_PROH_FL AS articleReadProhFl /* 금열람금지여부 */ , A.C_POINT_EXPIRY_DATE AS pointExpiryDate /* 포인트유효기간 */ , A.C_USER_JOIN_POINT AS userJoinPoint /* 회원가입포인트 */ , A.C_LOGIN_POINT AS loginPoint /* 로그인포인트 */ , A.C_WRITING_POINT AS writingPoint /* 글쓰기포인트 */ , A.C_ANSWER_POINT AS answerPoint /* 댓글포인트 */ , A.C_UPLOAD_POINT AS uploadPoint /* 업로드포인트 */ , A.C_DOWNLOAD_POINT AS downloadPoint /* 다운로드포인트 */ , A.C_RECMNDER_POINT AS recmnderPoint /* 추천인포인트 */ , A.C_DOWNLOAD_DEDU_POINT AS downloadDeduPoint /* 다운로드차감포인트 */ , A.C_ARTICLE_READ_DEDU_POINT AS articleReadDeduPoint /* 글열람차감포인트 */
, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'InChild' ELSE 'NoChild' END AS YesNo /* inline table from filed add point*/
WHERE A.C_PARENTID = #c_id# ORDER BY A.C_POSITION ASC
sqlMap.select: /* getChildNodeByLeftRight */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_USER_POINT_SETTING WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right# ORDER BY C_LEFT ASC
/* searchNodeByString */ SELECT c_left , c_right FROM T_USER_POINT_SETTING WHERE C_TITLE LIKE '%'||#searchStr#||'%'

/* searchNodeByPosition */ SELECT DISTINCT C_ID FROM T_USER_POINT_SETTING WHERE 1=1
( C_LEFT <= #[].c_left# AND C_RIGHT >= #[].c_right# )
sqlMap.update: /* alterNode */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_POINT_USE_FL = #pointUseFl# /* 포인트사용여부 */ , C_DOWNLOAD_PROH_FL = #downloadProhFl# /* 다운로드금지여부 */ , C_ARTICLE_READ_PROH_FL = #articleReadProhFl# /* 금열람금지여부 */ , C_POINT_EXPIRY_DATE = #pointExpiryDate# /* 포인트유효기간 */ , C_USER_JOIN_POINT = #userJoinPoint# /* 회원가입포인트 */ , C_LOGIN_POINT = #loginPoint# /* 로그인포인트 */ , C_WRITING_POINT = #writingPoint# /* 글쓰기포인트 */ , C_ANSWER_POINT = #answerPoint# /* 댓글포인트 */ , C_UPLOAD_POINT = #uploadPoint# /* 업로드포인트 */ , C_DOWNLOAD_POINT = #downloadPoint# /* 다운로드포인트 */ , C_RECMNDER_POINT = #recmnderPoint# /* 추천인포인트 */ , C_DOWNLOAD_DEDU_POINT = #downloadDeduPoint# /* 다운로드차감포인트 */ , C_ARTICLE_READ_DEDU_POINT = #articleReadDeduPoint# /* 글열람차감포인트 */ WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
sqlMap.select: /* getNode */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE , C_POINT_USE_FL AS pointUseFl /* 포인트사용여부 */ , C_DOWNLOAD_PROH_FL AS downloadProhFl /* 다운로드금지여부 */ , C_ARTICLE_READ_PROH_FL AS articleReadProhFl /* 금열람금지여부 */ , C_POINT_EXPIRY_DATE AS pointExpiryDate /* 포인트유효기간 */ , C_USER_JOIN_POINT AS userJoinPoint /* 회원가입포인트 */ , C_LOGIN_POINT AS loginPoint /* 로그인포인트 */ , C_WRITING_POINT AS writingPoint /* 글쓰기포인트 */ , C_ANSWER_POINT AS answerPoint /* 댓글포인트 */ , C_UPLOAD_POINT AS uploadPoint /* 업로드포인트 */ , C_DOWNLOAD_POINT AS downloadPoint /* 다운로드포인트 */ , C_RECMNDER_POINT AS recmnderPoint /* 추천인포인트 */ , C_DOWNLOAD_DEDU_POINT AS downloadDeduPoint /* 다운로드차감포인트 */ , C_ARTICLE_READ_DEDU_POINT AS articleReadDeduPoint /* 글열람차감포인트 */ FROM T_USER_POINT_SETTING WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* getNodeByRef */ SELECT C_ID , C_PARENTID , C_POSITION , C_LEFT , C_RIGHT , C_LEVEL , C_TITLE , C_TYPE FROM T_USER_POINT_SETTING WHERE C_ID = #ref#
sqlMap.delete: /* removeNode */ DELETE FROM T_USER_POINT_SETTING WHERE C_LEFT >= #c_left# AND C_RIGHT <= #c_right#
sqlMap.update: /* removedAfterLeftFix */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#
/* removedAfterRightFix */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
/* removedAfterPositionFix */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
sqlMap.select: /* searchNodeByString */ SELECT C_LEFT FROM T_USER_POINT_SETTING WHERE C_PARENTID = 0
sqlMap.update: /* cutMyselfPositionFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION - 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #c_parentid# AND C_POSITION > #c_position#
/* cutMyselfLeftFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT > #c_right#

/* cutMyselfRightFix moveNode case. parameterClass is nodeById*/ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT > #c_left#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchPositionForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_POSITION = C_POSITION + 1 WHERE C_PARENTID = #ref# AND C_POSITION >= #c_position#
AND C_ID NOT IN
(-1)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchLeftForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_LEFT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* stretchRightForMyselfFromJstree */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT + #spaceOfTargetNode# WHERE C_RIGHT >= #rightPositionFromNodeByRef#
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#
/* enterMyselfFixPosition */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_PARENTID = #ref# , C_POSITION = #c_position# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#

/* enterMyselfFixLeftRight */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_LEFT = C_LEFT - (#idif#) , C_RIGHT = C_RIGHT - (#idif#) , C_LEVEL = C_LEVEL - (#ldif#)
#c_idsByChildNodeFromNodeById[]#

/* addMyselfFromJstree */ INSERT INTO T_USER_POINT_SETTING ( C_ID, C_PARENTID, C_POSITION, C_LEFT, C_RIGHT, C_LEVEL ) VALUES ( S_USER_POINT_SETTING.NEXTVAL, #c_parentid#, #c_position#, #c_left#, #c_right#, #c_level# )
/* addMyselfFromJstree SEQ */ SELECT S_USER_POINT_SETTING.CURRVAL AS SEQ FROM DUAL
sqlMap.update: /* alterNodeType */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_TYPE = #c_type# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
/* fixCopyIF */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_POSITION = #fixCopyPosition# WHERE C_ID = #fixCopyId#
/* fixCopy */ UPDATE T_USER_POINT_SETTING SET C_PARENTID = #fixCopyId# WHERE C_ID = #c_id#
